recipes.title: Roasted Eggplant with Anchovy and Oregano
recipes.imageSearch: ottolenghi roasted eggplant anchovy oregano recipe
recipes.description: Tender roasted eggplant is topped with salty anchovies, fragrant oregano, and a bright lemon dressing for a simple yet flavourful dish.
recipes.whyYoullLoveIt: This dish delivers bold Mediterranean flavours with minimal effort, perfect for a weeknight.

recipes.title: Spiced Lamb Raan
recipes.imageSearch: dishoom lamb raan recipe
recipes.description: A whole leg of lamb, marinated in a complex blend of spices and slow-cooked until meltingly tender, served with naan and accompaniments.
recipes.whyYoullLoveIt: This showstopping dish offers rich, deeply spiced flavours and is perfect for a special occasion.

recipes.title: Coconut Dal with Spinach and Lime
recipes.imageSearch: lara lee coconut dal spinach lime recipe
recipes.description: Creamy coconut milk enhances this fragrant dal, packed with spinach and brightened with a squeeze of lime for a comforting and flavourful meal.
recipes.whyYoullLoveIt: This simple dal is packed with Southeast Asian flavours and offers a quick and easy weeknight option.

recipes.title: Ricotta Hotcakes with Banana and Honeycomb Butter
recipes.imageSearch: bill granger ricotta hotcakes recipe
recipes.description: Fluffy ricotta hotcakes served with caramelized bananas and a decadent honeycomb butter, perfect for a weekend brunch.
recipes.whyYoullLoveIt: These hotcakes are a classic Australian brunch dish, light, fluffy, and incredibly satisfying.

recipes.title: Halloumi Fritters with Harissa Yogurt
recipes.imageSearch: halloumi fritters harissa yogurt recipe
recipes.description: Salty halloumi is grated and formed into fritters, then fried until golden brown and served with a spicy harissa yogurt sauce.
recipes.whyYoullLoveIt: This combines Middle Eastern flavors with a fun and satisfying texture, perfect for a flavourful lunch.

recipes.title: Chicken with Chili Vinegar Glaze
recipes.imageSearch: nigella lawson chicken chili vinegar glaze recipe
recipes.description: Chicken thighs are glazed with a sweet, tangy, and spicy chili vinegar sauce, creating a delicious and effortless weeknight meal.
recipes.whyYoullLoveIt: This recipe delivers bold flavors with minimal effort, embodying Nigella's pleasure-first approach.

recipes.title: Borlotti Bean Ragu with Cavolo Nero
recipes.imageSearch: bold beans borlotti bean ragu cavolo nero recipe
recipes.description: Creamy borlotti beans are simmered in a rich tomato sauce with cavolo nero for a hearty and satisfying vegetarian ragu.
recipes.whyYoullLoveIt: This bean-forward dish is packed with flavour and offers a comforting and nutritious meal.

recipes.title: Roasted Carrots with Coriander Yogurt and Pistachios
recipes.imageSearch: joshua mcfadden roasted carrots coriander yogurt pistachios recipe
recipes.description: Simple roasted carrots are elevated with a bright coriander yogurt and crunchy pistachios, highlighting the natural sweetness of the vegetable.
recipes.whyYoullLoveIt: This dish showcases the best of seasonal produce with simple yet flavourful preparations.

recipes.title: The Ultimate Wonton Soup
recipes.imageSearch: kenji lopez alt wonton soup recipe
recipes.description: This meticulously tested recipe delivers the perfect wonton soup, with flavourful broth and tender, juicy wontons.
recipes.whyYoullLoveIt: Kenji's technique-driven approach ensures a restaurant-quality wonton soup at home.

recipes.title: Roast Chicken with Lemon and Herbs
recipes.imageSearch: diana henry roast chicken lemon herbs recipe
recipes.description: A classic roast chicken, infused with lemon and herbs, is beautifully simple and incredibly flavourful.
recipes.whyYoullLoveIt: Diana Henry's elegant simplicity shines in this comforting and delicious roast chicken recipe.

recipes.title: Crispy Tofu with Peanut Sauce
recipes.imageSearch: splash of soy crispy tofu peanut sauce recipe
recipes.description: Crispy tofu is tossed in a rich and flavourful peanut sauce, creating a quick and satisfying Asian-inspired meal.
recipes.whyYoullLoveIt: This dish delivers vibrant Asian flavours with a focus on ease and speed.

recipes.title: Burrata with Spicy Nduja and Grilled Bread
recipes.imageSearch: ixta belfrage burrata nduja grilled bread recipe
recipes.description: Creamy burrata is paired with spicy nduja and grilled bread for a simple yet incredibly flavourful appetizer.
recipes.whyYoullLoveIt: Ixta's bold flavour combinations are on full display in this simple and satisfying dish.

recipes.title: Spiced Black Bean Burgers
recipes.imageSearch: spiced black bean burger recipe
recipes.description: Hearty black beans are spiced with cumin, chili, and coriander, then formed into patties and pan-fried until crispy, served in buns with your favorite toppings.
recipes.whyYoullLoveIt: A flavourful and satisfying vegetarian burger, showcasing the versatility of beans.

recipes.title: Slow-Roasted Tomatoes with Garlic and Herbs
recipes.sourceDetail: From the Oven to the Table, page 26
recipes.imageSearch: diana henry slow roasted tomatoes garlic herbs recipe
recipes.description: Tomatoes are slow-roasted with garlic, herbs, and olive oil until intensely sweet and flavourful, perfect as a side dish or antipasto.
recipes.whyYoullLoveIt: This simple recipe transforms humble tomatoes into a flavour explosion with minimal effort.

recipes.title: Persian Jewelled Rice
recipes.imageSearch: ottolenghi jewelled rice recipe
recipes.description: Basmati rice is studded with dried fruits, nuts, and spices, creating a visually stunning and flavourful side dish that's perfect for a special occasion.
recipes.whyYoullLoveIt: This showstopping rice dish is packed with Middle Eastern flavours and textures, perfect for entertaining.

recipes.title: Sticky Date Pudding
recipes.imageSearch: nigella lawson sticky date pudding recipe
recipes.description: A classic sticky date pudding, drenched in a rich toffee sauce, is the ultimate comforting and indulgent dessert.
recipes.whyYoullLoveIt: This is pure Nigella at her best: an indulgent, comforting dessert that's guaranteed to satisfy.

recipes.title: Green Bean Salad with Miso Dressing
recipes.imageSearch: green bean salad miso dressing recipe
recipes.description: Blanched green beans are tossed in a vibrant miso dressing, showcasing the freshness of seasonal produce with a punchy Asian-inspired flavour.
recipes.whyYoullLoveIt: A simple yet flavourful salad that lets the fresh green beans shine with a bold Asian dressing.

recipes.title: Prawn Moilee
recipes.imageSearch: prawn moilee recipe
recipes.description: Tender prawns are simmered in a creamy coconut milk-based curry, infused with fragrant spices and a hint of chilli.
recipes.whyYoullLoveIt: This creamy and fragrant curry offers a delicious and comforting taste of India.

recipes.title: Chilli Garlic Noodles
recipes.sourceDetail: Inspired by Splash of Soy's style
recipes.imageSearch: chili garlic noodles recipe
recipes.description: Quick and easy noodles tossed in a spicy and garlicky sauce, perfect for a quick and flavourful weeknight meal.
recipes.whyYoullLoveIt: This dish provides a fast and vibrant Asian-inspired meal with a focus on bold flavours.

recipes.title: Spiced Chicken Liver Pâté with Sourdough Toast
recipes.imageSearch: chicken liver pate sourdough toast recipe
recipes.description: Rich and creamy chicken liver pâté is spiced with warming spices, served with toasted sourdough bread for a sophisticated appetizer.
recipes.whyYoullLoveIt: This elegant appetizer offers a sophisticated and flavourful start to any meal.
